title: Kaijuu Sekai Seifuku (TV)
title_jp: かいじゅうせかいせいふく
synopsis:
Follows four dragon-like monsters who came to Earth to conquer it — but first, they study humanity by freeloading off an office worker in her 20s. They turn her apartment into their secret base, and prepare for their world conquest … eventually.

(Source: ANN)
